titles.title: Commemorating the lifetime legacy of Alejandro "El Potrillo" Fernandez for his continued contributions to Mexican music and Latin culture internationally.
Commemorating the lifetime legacy of Alejandro "El Potrillo" Fernandez for his continued contributions to Mexican music and Latin culture internationally.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the contributions of Alejandro "El Potrillo" Fernandez continue to enrich the music industry and his legacy should be recognized and celebrated.
